docs.snippet: Spotted by police while allegedly driving erratically, he failed field sobriety tests and was arrested for driving while intoxicated and possessing controlled substances....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spotted by police while allegedly driving erratically, he failed field sobriety tests and was arrested for driving while intoxicated and possessing controlled substances.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay may face felony charges after being arrested when stopped for driving erratically; failed field sobriety test and multiple prescription drugs were found inside his vehicle; other football news noted.

headline.main: After Traffic Stop, Colts’ Owner May Face Felony Drug Charges
headline.print_headline: After Traffic Stop, Colts’ Owner May Face Felony Drug Charges

docs.snippet: The few who make it to the big leagues or top college levels can make six-figure salaries, while others can make good part-time incomes....
docs.lead_paragraph: The few who make it to the big leagues or top college levels can make six-figure salaries, while others can make good part-time incomes.
docs.abstract: Sports officiating provides an agreeable part-time job to many, and it can be possible to turn job into full-time living; still, landing one of more than 300 coveted and lucrative positions in big-league sports remains difficult prospect; officiating camps and professional schools offer aspiring officials a way in.

headline.main: Earning Their Stripes as Umpires and Referees

docs.snippet: The English soccer club Manchester City, along with the Yankees, will operate the Major League Soccer team when it begins play next season....
docs.lead_paragraph: The English soccer club Manchester City, along with the Yankees, will operate the Major League Soccer team when it begins play next season.
docs.abstract: New York City FC makes its debut in Major League Soccer in 2015, and coach Jason Kreis is immersing himself in all things Manchester City, which will operate club along with New York Yankees.

headline.main: New York City F.C. Coach Learning Manchester Way
